archimate:BusinessProcess.name: D. Technology Architecture
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Objectives: - Develop the Target Technology Architecture that enables the logical and physical application and data components and the Archtecture Vision - Identify candidate Architecture Roadmap componens based upon gaps between the Baseline and Target Technolgy Architecture
Begrepet omfatter alt vi oppfatter som IT-teknisk - under applikasjonsplattform.
Approach * Review the technology architecture resources avaialbe in the Architecture repostory - Exiting IT services in the IT repository or IT service cagalog ...
